mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(club_num, member_num, board_content, board_pic, board_regdate) VALUES(#{clubNum}, #{memberNum}, #{boardContent}, #{boardPic}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT board.*, member_nickname, member_pic FROM board JOIN member USING (member_num) WHERE board_num = #{boardNum}
SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE club_num = #{clubNum}

SELECT member.member_num, member.member_nickname, member.member_pic, board.board_num, board.board_content, board.board_pic, board.board_regdate FROM MEMBER NATURAL JOIN BOARD WHERE board.club_num = 2 ORDER BY board.board_num desc LIMIT #{startIndex}, 5
